skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: host health
des:
Posts your computer's health with an ad-hoc or scheduled https post of your host health and get a report from alexa.

Publish you host health with a https post call with some data as json. The the updated commands to run for a mac or linux: http://pennysydney.dog.

Enable the host health skill in alexa. Then ask host health "to add my mac address (read your mac address as single digits and characters [or any other alphanumeric ID of length 12])".

Now ask "alexa, ask host health for a report".

If you want to disassociate that host from your alexa account say "alexa, ask host health to remove host from fleet", and say yes or no when it iteratively asks by reading the friendly name that was published by your host (or the mac address / ID that was added if no host health had been published yet).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
